Articles.Content:
Apologies if this is not the appropriate forum category. Anyways, I just wanted to remind the developers to change the button in the main menu from "Spaceport" to "Curse". In my opinion it seems something that could be easily overlooked.

I had forgotten about it and was slightly puzzled when I got redirected to a 404 error.
Similarly, the demo advertises mods at Spaceport, for whenever you get around to making a new demo.

We have an internal issue just for this already.

Thanks for the reminder though.
You probably won't do this, but instead of a Curse link, could we have a forum link to the mod releases page?
Or even in addition to the Curse link. But isn't there already a Community link which sends the player to these forums? I think that's probably enough, really.
